nodes.text: The quloer was an aquatic species native to the planet Osirrag. Quloers were the primary aquatic prey of the onahk.

Quloers lived in underwater warrens dug below the surface of Osirrag's temperate, shallow marshes and wetlands. They were preyed upon by the native onahks, amphibians which spent the summer season patrolling the wetlands, and the winter hunting fish. These agile creatures were adept enough to wriggle around underwater obstacles such as roots, in order to dig into quoler warrens. Onahks were fearful of any creatures larger than their typical quoler prey, such as Humans.
